claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: James Francis `` Jim '' Cameron  (  born August 16 , 1954  )  is a Canadian filmmaker , director , producer , screenwriter , inventor , engineer , philanthropist , and deep-sea explorer .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He first found major success with the science-fiction action film The Terminator  (  1984  )  .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He then became a popular Hollywood director and was hired to write and direct Aliens  (  1986  )  ; three years later he followed up with The Abyss  (  1989  )  .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He found further critical acclaim for his use of special effects in Terminator 2 : Judgment Day  (  1991  )  .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After his film True Lies  (  1994  )  Cameron took on his biggest film at the time , Titanic  (  1997  )  , which earned him Academy Awards for Best Picture , Best Director and Best Film Editing .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After Titanic , Cameron began a project that took almost 10 years to make : his science-fiction epic Avatar  (  2009  )  , which was in particular a landmark for 3D technology , and for which he received nominations for the same three Academy Awards .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Despite Avatar being his only movie made to date in 3D , Cameron is the most successful 3D film-maker in terms of box-office revenue .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the time between making Titanic and Avatar , Cameron spent several years creating many documentary films  (  specifically underwater documentaries  )  and co-developed the digital 3D Fusion Camera System .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Described by a biographer as part scientist and part artist , Cameron has also contributed to underwater filming and remote vehicle technologies .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: On March 26 , 2012 , Cameron reached the bottom of the Mariana Trench , the deepest part of the ocean , in the Deepsea Challenger submersible .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is the first person to do this in a solo descent , and is only the third person to do so ever .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In total , Cameron 's directorial efforts have grossed approximately US$ 2 billion in North America and US$ 6 billion worldwide .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Not adjusted for inflation , Cameron 's Titanic and Avatar are the two highest-grossing films of all time at $ 2.19 billion and $ 2.78 billion respectively .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Cameron also holds the achievement of having directed two of the three films in history to gross over $ 2 billion worldwide .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In March 2011 , he was named Hollywood 's top earner by Vanity Fair , with estimated 2010 earnings of $ 257 million .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In October 2013 , a new species of frog Pristimantis jamescameroni from Venezuela was named after him in recognition of his efforts in environmental awareness , in addition to his public promotion of veganism .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1991 , Cameron directed the sequel to The Terminator , Terminator 2 : Judgment Day  (  with Schwarzenegger reprising his role  )  , and also executive produced the action crime film Point Break .

claim: Unforgettable is directed by James Cameron.
premise_source_doc_sentence: During its theatrical run , the film broke several box office records and became the highest-grossing film of all time , as well as in the United States and Canada , surpassing Titanic , which had held those records for twelve years  (  and was also directed by Cameron  )  .
